title: Don’t Get Distracted, The Killology Problem 6.3.20
itunes:title: Don’t Get Distracted, The Killology Problem 6.3.20
description:
In episode 642, Jack, Miles, and Jamie are joined by comedian Brandie Posey to discuss a history of curfews in this country, the man who taught cops to kill, people who are speaking out against looting, Trump trying to label Antifa a 'terrorist organization,' and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Ferguson clampdown: a brief history of curfews to contain protest in US cities
  2. Behind The Bastards: The Man Who Teaches Our Cops To Kill
  3. Stephanie Pratt Slammed for 'Shoot the Looters' Tweet as 2006 Shoplifting Mugshot Resurfaces
  4. Memphis Suburbs Bracing for Possible Violence From Antifa
  5. Trump says US will designate Antifa 'terrorist organisation'
  6. Trump says he's naming antifa a 'Terrorist Organization.' Can he do that?
  7. An Intimate History of Antifa
  8. The Long History of Antifa
  9. Two senators want antifa activists to be labeled ‘domestic terrorists.’ Here’s what that means.
  10. Why Trump's plan to label antifa a terrorist group is little more than 'political theatre'
  11. Trump’s ‘ANTIFA’ Threat Is Total Bullshit—And Totally Dangerous
  12. Donation Resources
  13. WATCH: Leikeli47 - Girl Blunt (Official Video)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
